body_html:
Try adding the below lines in somewhere near L185-192 in tools/build_pytorch_libs.bat:

                  -DUSE_MPI=OFF ^
                  -DUSE_DISTRIBUTED=OFF ^

If it works on your side, then I'll submit a PR on this. Anyway, thanks for your report.
body_text:
Try adding the below lines in somewhere near L185-192 in tools/build_pytorch_libs.bat:
                  -DUSE_MPI=OFF ^
                  -DUSE_DISTRIBUTED=OFF ^
If it works on your side, then I'll submit a PR on this. Anyway, thanks for your report.
body:
Try adding the below lines in somewhere near L185-192 in `tools/build_pytorch_libs.bat`:
```cmd
                  -DUSE_MPI=OFF ^
                  -DUSE_DISTRIBUTED=OFF ^
```
If it works on your side, then I'll submit a PR on this. Anyway, thanks for your report.
